page.title: 05Employment In Sorbie
page.content: Sorbie has a population of 112 people. 93 of them are over 16 years old, and only 7 of them are{unemployed The main source of{employment}in Sorbie is provided by the Creamery. The jobs they do include making cheese, packing cheese, and attending to boilers and maintenance of the place. Several people work on farms, as most of the land surrounding Sorbie is occupied by farms.Their jobs include tractor driving, milking cows, and general{farm labour.} Four of the women in Sorbie work as home helps for elderly and unfit people. Seven women have children to look after - they are classed as house wives. 9 people have jobs which require them to travel quite far.Their jobs include petrol attendant,coalman, joiner, factory and office work. Four people are {self-employed}.
